data.description:
**Embark on a Fascinating VR Anatomy Journey!**

"Anatomy & Physiology Lab" offers an immersive self-directed learning adventure that explores the captivating world of human anatomy and physiology through virtual reality. 

**Skeletal Lab:** Step into our cutting-edge Skeletal Lab to explore the intricacies of the human skeleton interactively.

**Skull Lab:** Dive into cranial and facial bones up close in the Skull Lab.

**Heart Lab:** Witness the complexity of the human heart through lifelike models, studying its anatomy and experiencing its rhythmic beat.

**VR Playground:** Beyond the labs, our VR playground presents mind-bending experiments and the full potential of VR technology.

**Interactive Learning Modules:** Our comprehensive learning modules feature interactive slides and knowledge-check quizzes to ensure a dynamic learning process.

Embark on this educational journey today and uncover the wonders of the human body in a captivating VR experience. "Anatomy & Physiology" goes beyond traditional learning tools, offering immersive exploration of human anatomy. Start your adventure now and unlock the secrets of the human body!

changelog.change_log: In this release, I revamped the skull and skeletal labs with a new script to optimize the performance. In the previous version, the skull lab would FPS would drop below 50 regularly. Now, the app stays stable at about 72 across all parts.
